label: Earrings
description: Jewelry worn on the earlobe or other parts of the ear.
intents: Find earrings to match an outfit.
Learn about different types of earrings.
Find earrings for a specific occasion.

subcategories.label: Stud Earrings
subcategories.description: Earrings that sit on the earlobe without dangling.

subcategories.label: Drop Earrings
subcategories.description: Earrings that dangle below the earlobe.

subcategories.label: Hoop Earrings
subcategories.description: Earrings that form a circular or semi-circular shape.

subcategories.label: Clip-On Earrings
subcategories.description: Earrings that attach to the ear without piercing.

subcategories.label: Cuff Earrings
subcategories.description: Earrings that wrap around the ear.
